description:
Dettman Law does not just serve as legal counsel for victims of motor vehicle accidents, though we are that, too. When clients entrust our Louisville, Kentucky, law office with their personal injury cases, we become their partners in their pursuits for justice. We aggressively advocate for maximum compensation for all the pain and suffering, financial hardship and loss that injured parties endure as results of other parties' negligence, and we fight to uphold their rights at every turn. As a team, we possess extensive knowledge and resources, and we call upon each of them to ensure the best possible outcomes for clients and their families.

Our law office focuses exclusively on all things personal injury. Attorneys Brian Dettman and Ryan Hooss, Esq., have helped thousands of clients in making claims against insurance companies and negligent parties in matters pertaining to the following:

• Trucking accidents
• Premises liability
• Products liability
• Animal bites
• Aviation and mass transit accidents
• Birth injury
• Brain injury
• Medical malpractice
• Nursing home abuse
• Construction accidents
• Assault and battery - plaintiff
• Workers' compensation
• Bad faith insurance
• Wrongful death

The team at Dettman Law understands how life-altering the aftereffects of an accident can be. Following the free initial consultation, we take immediate and decisive action to prevent the worsening of clients' physical conditions, mental health and financial situations. We also go above and beyond to ensure our clients' utmost comfort by making same-day and hospital visits and hosting virtual appointments.

Our compassionate and focused approach has resulted in several awards and recognitions for our team. For instance, Mr. Dettman is AV Preeminent peer-review rated,* the highest rating, through Martindale-Hubbell. He also has a "Superb" rating on Avvo and was selected for inclusion in Kentucky Super Lawyers' Rising Stars in 2015 and 2019 to 2021. In addition, Mr. Hooss has been included on the Kentucky Super Lawyers' Rising Stars list since 2018.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer-review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary.

Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review RatingsTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
